titleStmt.title: Horace his arte of poetrie, pistles, and satyrs Englished and to the Earle of Ormounte by Tho. Drant addressed.
Selections. English
titleStmt.author: Horace.
Drant, Thomas, d. 1578?

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, nere to S. Dunstones Churche, by Thomas Marshe,

notesStmt.note: The satires are reprinted from Drant's translation in "A medicinable morall".
At least H outer, K outer, and L inner sheets are in two settings; headlines are (1) in roman or (2) in italic.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
